ZETA – Cross-chain made simple

Let’s take a closer look at ZETA. It’s the native token of ZetaChain, a Layer 1 blockchain that’s all about making cross-chain transactions smooth and seamless. With ZETA, you can interact with multiple blockchains without needing wrapped tokens or complex setups. It’s a simple, efficient way to dive into DeFi and decentralized apps across different ecosystems.
